name: MGB OIL PRESS
description: Oil pressure below limits at both engine MGB inputs or at one engine MGB input and in MGB oil system (less than 3.1 bar).

procedure.heading: IF MGB oil pressure within limits:
procedure.text:
- Land as soon as practicable monitoring MGB oil pressure and temperature and input bearing temperature.
- Do not activate the chip burner.
- Torque value may be resumed to previous setting.

procedure.heading: IF MGB oil pressure low or invalid:
procedure.text:
- Land as soon as possible.
- Landing or ditching should be made within 33 minutes.
- Do not activate the chip burner.
55/55% TQ may be shortly exceeded for the final part of the landing manoeuvre.
